For all you people that are having problems, it's because this contains the update for the new Disc Format, that flashes drives!  If you have a moded drive, it will fail, and you can lose use of the system. You have to flash back to STOCK, then update, then go back to CFW.  It is ALL your own stupid faults for not researching this stuff before doing it.  DO not blame the uploader, YOU are the dummies that knows nothing about the new update, and what it does.   If you flash back to ORIGINAL firmware, then the loop stops, then you go back to CFW. If you wanna be a PIRATE and steal this shit, then you suffer the consequences when you don't know what's going on in the scene.

Ok dumbasses. If you brick your system, it's not the fault of the person uploading the game, got it? It's Microsoft's new method of cracking you guys down. If you have an older Firmware, this will cause issues. It's basically your damn fault for not reading that the flash for this torrent is for 1.9+, so don't blame those providing the ripped disc.

Now if you want to know how to bring your xbox back to life, here's how. Check out the link to flash your xbox with a USB flash drive and your xbox should be back to normal.

http://digiex.net/downloads/download-center-2-0/xbox-360-content/dashboard-updates/8489-xbox-360-dashboard-update-2-0-13146-0-download-final-version-avatars.html

Problem is, it will be back to normal so you won't be playing backups until you flash to the lastest dash. 

Your welcome.
